validators.invalidLength: ‚ùó **{{description}}** has invalid value. It must be between {{minNameLength}} and {{maxNameLength}}
validators.invalidFirstLetter: ‚ùó **{{description}}** has to start from upper case letter
validators.invalidPointsRange: ‚ùó **{{description}}** has invalid range for the given points category **{{categoryName}}**. It must be between {{min}} and {{max}}
validators.invalidNumbersRange: ‚ùó **{{description}}** can not value value greater than **{{secondDescription}}**
validators.invalidDateFormat: ‚ùó **{{description}}** has invalid date format. Required date format is **{{dateInputFormat}}**
validators.invalidDatesRange: ‚ùó **{{min}}** can not be later date than **{{max}}**
validators.invalidContestVoteScoreRange: ‚ùó **{{description}}** has invalid range for the given points category **{{categoryName}}**. It must be between 0 and {{max}}
validators.invalidPointsGiver: üí© You can not add points to yourself
validators.invalidUrl: ‚ùó {{optionDescription}} passed as **{{optionId}}** parameter is invalid URL.

options.name: Announcement name
options.hoursBefore: Number of hours the announcement should be Announcemented before contest will change it's state
options.contestState: Contest state that will trigger this announcement
options.showRules: Show contest rules in the announcement
options.showVoteCategories: Show contest vote categories in the announcement
options.showRewards: Show contest rewards in the announcement
options.showEntries: Show currently submitted contest entries in the announcement
options.showVotingResults: Show the results of finished voting in the announcement
options.useByDefault: Assign this announcement by default in every new contest
